name: Ministo
summary: Ministo (legendary OG miners) are available for hire in Minado.
description: Service agreement for the extraction of $TOKEN assets, by a certified Ministo specialist, from a designated Ministo PoW mining facility.
legal: Allows for one (1) Ministo to mine (non-stop), at a designated Ministo PoW mining facility, from the start of the contract until the specified expiration date.
creator: Ava's DAO

contact.address: 3455 Peachtree Rd NE, Suite #500, Atlanta, GA 30326
